Text.Page:
Hey! Are you going to the Halloween party?

Assuming it actually happens. Eldritch Academy is a mess now. Brigands of some sort are trying to disrupt the party and steal the witches' magic candy.

Serena delegated the party to Titiana, but she's too busy pretending to be a detective to accomplish anything useful. I can teleport you there, if you like."Got it."
No Halloween party this year, I hear. Bummer.
